title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 476.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 476.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) Except as otherwise specified in
subdivision (b) of this section, the provisions of this Article shall be
applicable to all children's facilities subject to visitation, inspection and
supervision by the department, including but not limited to the following: (1)
voluntary child-caring institutions
operated by not-for-profit or membership corporations or by a charitable
organization otherwise established pursuant to statute; (2)
public child-caring
institutions; (3)
group
residences; (4)
group homes; and
(5)
agency boarding
homes. (b) The
provisions of this Article are not applicable to any facility operated by a

State department or agency or a facility which, pursuant to law, is licensed or
certified to operate by a State department or agency or by an authorized
agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
476.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
